manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you looking for the ideal pillow that is soft, comfortable, fluffy and supportive? Simply slide into Bedufsar's luxury hotel-quality medium firmness pillows,they are not only soft and fluffy but also supportive without flattening,supporting your head and neck for a restful night's sleep.

Bedufsar Focuses on Sleep ~ What does the redefined quality sleep experience look like！ When was the last time you actually had a good night's sleep? A good night's sleep begins with the Bedufar pillows for sleeping, right now ! Features: 1. Support&Comfort : These set of 2 medium firmness pillows is filled with the perfect ratio of 5D support fibers to provide ample support for sleep. 2. Cooling & Breathable: The pillows cover is covered with microfiber for adequate breathability and skin-friendly feel, so hot sleepers will enjoy a peaceful night. 3. High-End Premium Quality: All product materials are carefully selected, strictly inspected and carefully constructed conform to the standards of 5-star hotels, making the pillow durable and suitable for daily use. 4. luxurious Dual Band Design： Constructed with gusted sidewalls, the pillow stays in shape and the navy blue/rose red-colored design adds a luxurious feel

Medium-Firmness Bedufsar hotel pillows use 5D down alternative of fibers, which are stronger than ordinary fibers, soft and fluffy and have good elasticity, providing moderate comfort and supporting your sweet dreams every night. Sleeping Heights & Gusset Design Bedufsar Luxury Hotel pillows are designed with a lining, which is a strip of fabric sewn between the top and bottom of the pillow, allowing the pillow to hold its shape better, and the three-dimensional edge is designed to give the pillow a perfect fluffy height of 9 inches, which is well adapted to American sleeping habits. Supportive & Comfort Suit All Sleepers Our bed pillows for sleeping are made with a great balance of supple softness and plump firmness, providing gentle support and adequate comfort for the head, neck and your body, making them suitable for the side, stomach and back sleepers.

OEKO-Certificated Theses down alternative pillows are certificated by Oeko-tex Teasures textiles meet high safety and environmental standards,Please use it with confidence for you and your family. Strict Quality Control All product materials are carefully selected, rigorously inspected, carefully fabricated, after hundreds of fine-tuning and thousands of trials to make the pillow comfortable and durable. Product Specifications Size: .Standard: 20" x 26" .Queen: 20" x 30" .King: 20" x 34" Material: Filling: Plush fine fiber Firmness: Medium Firmness Warm Tips: .Wash: Use mild and bleaching-free detergent. .Let Them Air Out in the Sun: Hang pillows outside from a clothesline on a sunny day 4 to 6 times per year.

How to make a pillow fluff up quickly? Squeeze the PillowHit the PillowMassage Evenly the PillowLet it air out for 24h to inflate completely Tips for Fluffing up Pillows Beat and hit the pillows from all four sides to make them more fluffy Tips for Fluffing up Pillows Beat and fold the pillows from all four sides to make them more fluffy Tips for Fluffing up Pillows Let it air out for 24h to inflate completely Squeeze the Pillows Hit the Pillows Fold the Pillows Touch the Pillows Use after 24 hours
EASY TO CLEAN How to Clean Wash Below（40°)Do not bleach or ironTumble dry on low heatAir dry in the sun

1/3 of Your Life Derserves A Better Sleep, Hotel Luxury Pillows Waiting for You to Experience Questions & Answers Q1：What is the size of this pillow? A1：Standard: 20x26 Inch Queen: 20x30 Inch King: 20x34 Inch Q2：What material are the pillow cores made of? A2：The cooling pillow is made of gel down alternative to provide you with a constant-temperature night's sleep. Q3：How firm is the pillow? A3：The pillow is moderately firm and soft, which can support your neck and head well. Q4：Are the pillows machine washable? A4： The medium firmness pillows are machine washable with tumble dry low, and will always feel and look new. Q5：How to make a pillow fluff up quickly? A5: Open the plastic wrap and remove the pillow，Leave it for 30 minutes, the pillow will expand automatically，Ventilate the pillow for about 24 hours and the pillow will fully inflate,Once fully inflated, a gel cooling pillow can be used as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are fluffy yet firm. They do not flatten out when you sleep on them. I have been using them for over two weeks and so far still like them. I did purchase more for a guest room and then king size for my room. The king size seem not as sturdy/firm as the queen. I would definitely stick with the queen which seem to be a better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did you see the price!?! Y'all better go on and buy this 2-Pack of Pillows!
reviews.reviewText: I followed the directions... I removed them from the package, and resisted fluffing them for 30 minutes. (That was hard) They did expand somewhat, then I followed the fluff method described in the "How do you make a pillow fluff up quickly?" (Scroll down the page past all of the pictures of people enjoying the pillows) and you'll see it...There's pictures showing how to:1. Squeeze the pillows2. Hit the pillows (softly on the bed)3. Massage Evenly the pillows4. Let them air out for 24hrs to inflate completely. (And they will)IT WORKS! We have had our pillows for over a month, and they're still just as comfortable, supportive & soft & fluffy like they were 24hrs after we unwrapped them. Follow the instructions and you will 😴 like a 👶.ENJOY!!Update:I returned on 12/01/2023 and PURCHASED ANOTHER 2-Pack of these Pillows!! 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These pillows are nice and well made but NOT firm
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these pillows specifically because I needed firmer pillows. Although they are clearly well made and comfortable to use, they are not at all what I would consider firm. I'll keep them since they are really nice and I went through the trouble of getting them all fluffed up and expanded (they arrive completely compressed), I will likely still need to find a firmer pillow for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Same day fluff. Let’s see how they do in a month
reviews.reviewText: This is the same day opening and fluffed. They’re way more soft and fluffy than they are firm. However in comparison to the pillow in the yellow I got from target they are definitely much more proficient. We’ll see how it goes after a month of sleeping on them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent firmness - but when they get it right, it’s right!
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered this product once before and absolutely loved it. It had the perfect firmness I was looking for at a price I was comfortable with. However, when I ordered another set, I was completely shocked to find that the firmness wasn't even half of my prior purchase. I'll be returning my second order and placing another one. I really hope I get another firm set. I'm not thrilled that it's taking more effort than it should to get the desired product, but I know they are capable of providing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Took a day to fully refluff but they are amazing!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the feel
reviews.reviewText: Well made. Fluffed up quickly once out of package. Love the feel between your hands, they feel like gel.Comfortable to sleep on. Content so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expexted
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are much softer than I expected. I was wanting a firmer pillow, these are rather mushy.

I would have loved to have them a bit firmer, as I am trying to replace the pillows I used to get at Sears which you could choose between medium and firm and these are medium pillows. I am getting use to them, with a big towel under the pillow they are working out for me :)
